Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.operationsprovider

package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.operationsprovider
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator
     
    ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.complex
     
    ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.operation
     
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractOperationsProvider<T>
    Just one variant of OperationsProvider interface implementation, that is responsible for providing operations for Calculator.
    ComplexOperationsProvider
    An implementation of OperationsProvider with Complex as a type of operands and minimal set of operations.
    DoubleOperationsProvider
    An implementation of OperationsProvider with Double as a type of operand and a set of basic arithmetic operations, such as "+", "-", "*", "/", "^" with obvious meanings, some trigonometrical operations - "sin" and "cos" - and "to-deg" and "to-rad", providing conversion from radians to degree and backwards.
    OperationsProvider<T>
    An interface responsible for providing operations for Calculator.
